website_summaries.verdict: One of the better spark screens to buy for larger fire pits if you want something that will last a long time.
pros: Heavy-duty construction of the spark screen relies on steel and fire/heat-resistant paint so the screen will last many years
Large handle makes it easy to move the screen when desired
Steel construction and high-temperature black paint
cons: Steel in the spark screen can rust over time if left out in bad weather or humidity

customer_reviews.title: Rusts within year despite cover
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works great. Only the screen mesh rusted and broke through at the end of the first season. It was covered with heavy canvas cover when not in use. We leave near the coast, salty air I guess because it didn't get rained on. Thought we would have at least 2 years useage. We live in warm climate so fit pit season is short. Metal is too weak. Definitely put coat heat rated paint before use. A little expensive for just one season. We used it anyway and it works where there are not big holes. Will try a different brand/vendor for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: High heat paint before use! It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the others, you must put on 2-3 coats of heat paint before use. We used high gloss black and just absolutely love it! Used it for hours the first time. Amazing! We call it the bo*b. It does have a handle to lift it to put in more wood so get the long poker and you'll have it made!
customer_reviews.author: dirtydeedsreviewsyou

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen! We built our fire pit a few summers ago and got this screen so that our nosy neighbor couldn't complain. It does show rust, but we spray it with some of the high-heat black spray paint meant for grills in the spring each year and it keeps it looking wonderful. Now that we have a baby, I'll be glad to have this for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne M LaFranceTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great looking firepit screen.
customer_reviews.text: We looked everywhere to find a firepit screen and found this. It works great and looks very nice on my firepit. My fire pit is 4ft. from side to side and this fits very good on the top with about an inch to spare around. The only negative is when you open it, it creeps forward a little and I always have to push it back when we are using it. I am going to look to attach it to my fire pit somehow so it doesn't move forward. Not a game breaker but a tiny bit annoying. This is very easy to put together and blocks 98% of the ash floating around. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JIMMYB from the OC

customer_reviews.title: This grate fits literally like a glove over it
customer_reviews.text: We have a 36" metal surround to our fireplace that sticks up about 8 to 12 inches from the base of the fire pit. This grate fits literally like a glove over it. It is easy to use. I have a daycare so I use it to protect kids from getting into the fire pit, and I have been very pleased. It is heavy enough where kids can't move it, but adults can easily.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The screen totally disintegrated after only one year. Cant believe I paid this much and it lasted a year ( one season). We didn't have large fires either so excessive heat didn't cause it to fail. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mesh very thin and sharp when handling ; it cut my thumb
customer_reviews.text: size was good but unclear directions, 2 screws missing and the mesh is too thin and dangerous. The wire mesh punctured my thumb and made it bleed. Gloves must be worn to avoid being cut because the mesh should be thicker and secured down to prevent injury cuts
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit screen!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in the midst of a burn ban during North Carolina's drought, it took us a while to finally use it. But it works great. I took other reviewers' suggestions and sprayed it with high temperature paint. Nice design, the hinge works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: gr8g8r

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: As simple as it looks it took about an hour to get this together. Mine is setup very similar to the picture. It's large and I put full size 18 inch logs in the fire pit. All the big ashes are stopped but the small ones still fly up through the holes. But none of the small ashes are hot, just ash. I put a plastic cover on mine when not in use to help prevent it from rusting out. That said, the paint is already burning off on the screen. I'll be happy if it lasts me 3 years. Heat and water will always win in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Same as described,rusting fast.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size, but rusted very fast, just in few weeks, so have to painting every spring and every fall, even it's covered all the time with good quality covering material.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fit and construction!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. High quality, heavy construction and easy to use. Love the folding feature for stirring the fire and coals when grilling out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: beasech

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I have applied fire proof paint 2-3x and there is still rust and now holes in the screen.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband made a fire-pit similar to the one in the photo and we were looking for screens to fit the pit. We found this product and was a little leary on the quality. Received product promptly, put it together very easily and placed on fire pit. Fit perfectly and a good sturdy screen also. We have used threw the season without any complaints. Would receommend to anyone with a large fire pit.

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen

customer_reviews.author: BLBshopper

customer_reviews.title: After 5 years, time to buy another
customer_reviews.text: 5 years, a half mile from the ocean, an annual paint job and the screen finally gave. Kept it in the shed when not in use and it was a real value. Pit covers that size are typically much more expensive and this one did the job really well.
customer_reviews.author: 555485v

customer_reviews.author: S. Dey

customer_reviews.title: The height is good. It will provide spark arresting from rising ashes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fire pit cover
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Has been exposed to the rain and heat and is holding up well. I did spray it with rustoleum high heat for protection after reading some reviews about rust . I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Two stars is generous
customer_reviews.text: I will give this two stars because it assembles easily. As far as the quality, it is sub-par. Within the first 3 days, it was covered with rust. The paint is so thin that it needs to be painted several times in order to actually leave it outdoors. The framework seems to be heavy enough and the screen is adequate. It may, or may not be the suppliers fault, but upon arrival the package was completely destroyed. I had to wait a couple more weeks for replacement parts. For the price, I was very disappointed.

product_meta.title: Hampton's Buzaar 40 Inch Fire Pit Easy Access Spark Screen
product_meta.description:
Heavy duty steel 40" diameter fire pit spark screen. 40 Inch safety screen comes in 4 pieces which forms a dome shape when put together. You don't need to remove it from the fire pit to tend the fire. Hinges incorporated in our design let half of the dome mesh screen slide inside the other half. 

Buzaar Spark Screens' heavy duty construction and sturdy handle allows easy and safe operation. This is a high temperature black powder coated,heavy duty steel fire pit screen. We have upgraded materials and design over the years to improve the quality of our fire pit screens. 

We believe Hampton's Buzaar's fire pit screens are better and will last longer than other spark screens in the market today. All our products are backed with 2 year manufacturer's warranty.
feature_bullets: Half of the dome slides into the other half
Convenient folding spark screen design for easy access.
Steel construction finished with high temperature black paint.
